name: part_014
file: tmp_hololive English 1st Concert -Connect the World- Supported By BUSHIROAD [Free Preview] [-2H-WjJBWsA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Intro graphics and audience shots for the Hololive English 1st Concert - Connect the World.
Opening transition graphics and stage reveal with the full group appearing.
Full group performance of the concert's theme song 'Connect the World'.

subtitles.original: Let's Connect our worlds and have a blast, y'all! HoloEN has been working so hard to make you Smile, now we wanna Connect them all! 大好き!!
subtitles.english: Let's Connect our worlds and have a blast, y'all! HoloEN has been working so hard to make you Smile, now we wanna Connect them all! I love you!!

subtitles.original: Kikkeriki-! Finally the long awaited day has come! I'm so happy to perform for everyone! Let's make this day the most special one! I want to hear and see you cheer! ENに会いにきてくれてありがとう♡ KFP♡LOVE
subtitles.english: Kikkeriki-! Finally the long awaited day has come! I'm so happy to perform for everyone! Let's make this day the most special one! I want to hear and see you cheer! Thanks for coming to see EN ♡ KFP ♡ LOVE

subtitles.original: WAH!! It's finally happening!! EN Concert!!! Thank you so much everyone who supported us to make this happen!! I can't wait to see everyone from the stage again! We Are Hype!! See you soon!! Inanis.
subtitles.english: WAH!! It's finally happening!! EN Concert!!! Thank you so much everyone who supported us to make this happen!! I can't wait to see everyone from the stage again! We Are Hype!! See you soon!! Inanis.

subtitles.original: Makin' Hololive history! ナイス! Gawr Gura
subtitles.english: Makin' Hololive history! Nice! Gawr Gura

subtitles.original: We made it! Our First EN Concert & I wanna See you Guys MOVE! Hope you all have light sticks! Can't wait to see every one on stage! Thank you for making this Possible - AME
subtitles.english: We made it! Our First EN Concert & I wanna See you Guys MOVE! Hope you all have light sticks! Can't wait to see every one on stage! Thank you for making this Possible - AME

subtitles.original: HiRyS! I am so excited for our FIRST EN Concert! Let's make it an unforgettable memory! たのしみましょう! IRyS
subtitles.english: HiRyS! I am so excited for our FIRST EN Concert! Let's make it an unforgettable memory! Let's have fun! IRyS

subtitles.original: Kirin LOVE. Oh, hello there. I'm so happy to see everyone. Thank you for listening to my voice today! 大好き♡
subtitles.english: Kirin LOVE. Oh, hello there. I'm so happy to see everyone. Thank you for listening to my voice today! I love you ♡

subtitles.original: Thank you, everyone! Please look forward to the concert.
subtitles.english: Thank you, everyone! Please look forward to the concert.

subtitles.original: Oh hi! :D I'm so happy we can all be here today! I never imagined I'd be able to perform like this for so many people around the world! Thank you for making this possible! いつもありがとうございます!
subtitles.english: Oh hi! :D I'm so happy we can all be here today! I never imagined I'd be able to perform like this for so many people around the world! Thank you for making this possible! Thank you as always!

subtitles.original: * CONCERT DAY IS HERE!! * Ugi Wogi... am spaghetti... BUT! WE READY TO PUT ON THE BEST SHOW POSSIBLE!! IDOL RAT IS MAKING A COMEBACK! Thank you for all the support, love and support <3 いつも応援してくれてありがとう!! 最強のライブにするぞ!! HOLO EN FOREVER Hakos Baelz
subtitles.english: * CONCERT DAY IS HERE!! * Ugi Wogi... am spaghetti... BUT! WE READY TO PUT ON THE BEST SHOW POSSIBLE!! IDOL RAT IS MAKING A COMEBACK! Thank you for all the support, love and support <3 Thank you for always supporting me!! I'm gonna make this the best live ever!! HOLO EN FOREVER Hakos Baelz

subtitles.original: 同じ未来を見ていたい
subtitles.english: I want to look toward the same future

subtitles.original: あの夢手にしてみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try reaching for that dream

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った心で走れもっと
subtitles.english: With our own distinct hearts, let's run further

subtitles.original: どこを見ても真っ暗な場所に芽生えてた
subtitles.english: Sprouting in a place where everything seemed dark

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな希望にこの瞳(め)奪われた
subtitles.english: This tiny hope stole my gaze

subtitles.original: 不安で揺れる心をうまくチューニングして
subtitles.english: Tuning my heart, which was shaking with anxiety

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな勇気を振り絞っていたよ
subtitles.english: I was squeezing out every bit of my small courage

subtitles.original: あきらめの文字デリートして進む
subtitles.english: Deleting the word "give up" and moving forward

subtitles.original: 苦しい時ももう私は一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Even in painful times, I'm not alone anymore

subtitles.original: だからももっと夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: So I want to chase my dreams even more

subtitles.original: ワクワク止まらない
subtitles.english: This excitement won't stop

subtitles.original: 想像超えてく世界見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you a world that exceeds your imagination

subtitles.original: アクセスしてみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try accessing it

subtitles.original: 後悔なんてさせない
subtitles.english: I won't let you have any regrets

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った心で走れもっと
subtitles.english: With our own distinct hearts, let's run further

subtitles.original: 夜の空に輝く眩しい想いは
subtitles.english: These dazzling feelings shining in the night sky

subtitles.original: 見たことのない光をリアルに届けるよ
subtitles.english: Will deliver a light never seen before, for real

subtitles.original: いつも聞こえるエールをここにキャプチャーして
subtitles.english: Capturing the cheers I always hear right here

subtitles.original: また新しい光を探したくなるよ
subtitles.english: It makes me want to search for a new light again

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔を保存して進む
subtitles.english: Saving your smile and moving forward

subtitles.original: 悲しい時に見返すよ力が湧くから
subtitles.english: I'll look back at it when I'm sad, it gives me strength

subtitles.original: 胸を張って夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: I want to chase my dreams with pride

subtitles.original: 奇跡のストーリー
subtitles.english: A story of miracles

subtitles.original: 一緒に作ろう終わらない夢を
subtitles.english: Let's create an endless dream together

subtitles.original: 愛が待ってたこの世界
subtitles.english: This world where love was waiting

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った心で彩れ
subtitles.english: Color it with our own distinct hearts

subtitles.original: 悲しい時も寂しい時も信じ合えるものがある
subtitles.english: Even in sad or lonely times, there's something we can believe in together

subtitles.original: 忘れずにこの鼓動鳴らし続けたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep this heartbeat going without forgetting

subtitles.original: 終わらない世界に溢れ出すよ
subtitles.english: It'll overflow into this endless world
